result.Case Summary:
BEFORE THE NATIONAL ADJUDICATORY COUNCIL  NASD In the Matter of Department of Enforcement, Complainant, vs. Sisung Securities Corporation New Orleans, LA, and Lawrence J. Sisung Jr. Gretna, LA, Respondents. Held, Hearing Panel's findings affirmed, in part, and reversed, in part. Sanctions modified consistent with the findings set forth herein. Appearances For the Complainant: Mark P. Dauer, Esq., Leo F. Orenstein, Esq., Department of Enforcement, NASD for the Respondents: Thomas K. Potter, Esq., Stacie M.
Related Documents
